trans-unit.source: Track service health
trans-unit.target: Track service health

trans-unit.source: Find out when Azure has experienced performance degradation or service interruptions.
trans-unit.target: Find out when Azure has experienced performance degradation or service interruptions.

trans-unit.source: Track service health
trans-unit.target: Track service health

trans-unit.source: Azure publicizes each time there is a service interruption or performance degradation.
trans-unit.target: Azure publicizes each time there is a service interruption or performance degradation.

trans-unit.source: You can browse these events in the Azure portal, and you can also use the <link><linkText>REST API</linkText><title></title></link> or <link><linkText>.NET SDK</linkText><title></title></link> to access the full set of events programmatically.
trans-unit.target: You can browse these events in the Azure portal, and you can also use the <link><linkText>REST API</linkText><title></title></link> or <link><linkText>.NET SDK</linkText><title></title></link> to access the full set of events programmatically.

trans-unit.source: See the service health by region
trans-unit.target: See the service health by region

trans-unit.source: Sign in to the <link><linkText>Azure Portal</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Sign in to the <link><linkText>Azure Portal</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: On Home you should see a tile called Service health
trans-unit.target: On Home you should see a tile called Service health

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Home</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Home</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Clicking that tile will give you a list of all the regions in Azure.
trans-unit.target: Clicking that tile will give you a list of all the regions in Azure.

trans-unit.source: You can click any region to see the service health history for that region.
trans-unit.target: You can click any region to see the service health history for that region.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Home</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Home</linkText>

trans-unit.source: You can also see the details of an individual incident by clicking that in the table.
trans-unit.target: You can also see the details of an individual incident by clicking that in the table.

trans-unit.source: Browse the full service health logs
trans-unit.target: Browse the full service health logs

trans-unit.source: Click on the Browse and select Audit logs.
trans-unit.target: Click on the Browse and select Audit logs.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Browse Hub</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Browse Hub</linkText>

trans-unit.source: This will open up a blade showing all of the events that have impacted any of your subscriptions for the past 7 days.
trans-unit.target: This will open up a blade showing all of the events that have impacted any of your subscriptions for the past 7 days.

trans-unit.source: Service health entries will show up in this list, but it may be difficult to find them as the list can be large.
trans-unit.target: Service health entries will show up in this list, but it may be difficult to find them as the list can be large.

trans-unit.source: Click the Filter command.
trans-unit.target: Click the Filter command.

trans-unit.source: Select Event category and choose Service health:
trans-unit.target: Select Event category and choose Service health:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>All events</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>All events</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click Updated.
trans-unit.target: Click Updated.

trans-unit.source: You will now see all of the service health events that have impacted your subscription:
trans-unit.target: You will now see all of the service health events that have impacted your subscription:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Resource groups</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Resource groups</linkText>

trans-unit.source: From there you can go to the details blade to see the specifics of the event.
trans-unit.target: From there you can go to the details blade to see the specifics of the event.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Receive alert notifications</linkText><title></title></link> whenever an event happens.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Receive alert notifications</linkText><title></title></link> whenever an event happens.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Monitor service metrics</linkText><title></title></link> to make sure your service is available and responsive.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Monitor service metrics</linkText><title></title></link> to make sure your service is available and responsive.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Monitor availability and responsiveness of any web page</linkText><title></title></link> with Application Insights so you can find out if your page is down.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Monitor availability and responsiveness of any web page</linkText><title></title></link> with Application Insights so you can find out if your page is down.
